# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This offer takes into account both the quality of the product and the significant benefit it will bring to you. I look forward to hearing your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
